original_title: R.E.M. Unplugged: The Complete 1991 and 2001 Sessions
overview: This release is composed of two performances that the band made on the U.S. television show MTV Unplugged. Among the album's 33 tracks are 11 performances which were not aired on either broadcast.
title: R.E.M. Unplugged: The Complete 1991 and 2001 Sessions
